mean_en: an effect caused by hot air in deserts or on roads, that makes you think you can see something, such as water, which is not there; a hope or wish that you cannot make happen because it is not realistic
sentence: I thought there was water in the distance, but it was only a mirage.
sentence_trans: 我原以为远处有水源，但它却只是海市蜃楼。
word_etyma: mir惊奇，看 + age状态 → 惊奇状态 → 奇景
